[File: aptos-core/types/src/keyless/configuration.rs] [Function: new_for_testing()] [State Inconsistency] Does new_for_testing() inherit override_aud_vals from new_for_devnet() including test audience values, and can this propagate test configurations into production deployments? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/keyless/configuration.rs] [Function: new_for_testing()] [Time Overflow] Can SAMPLE_EXP_HORIZON_SECS + 1 overflow u64 when added to current timestamp during expiry checks, causing integer wraparound and making all signatures immediately expire? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/keyless/configuration.rs] [Function: is_allowed_override_aud()] [Validation Bypass] Can is_allowed_override_aud() be bypassed using unicode homoglyphs or zero-width characters that appear identical but don't match exact string comparison? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/keyless/configuration.rs] [Function: is_allowed_override_aud()] [Logic Error] Does is_allowed_override_aud() check 'matches == 0' and return error, but can duplicate entries in override_aud_vals cause matches > 1 leading to different behavior than intended? (Low)
